Class ButtonAttacher

java.lang.Object
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.utils.ButtonAttacher
public class ButtonAttacher extends Object
Utility class responsible for attaching a Button to a given
invalid reference 
Prop
based on its configured name in utiLITI.

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public static Button attach(Prop entity)
      Attaches and returns the Button associated with the provided
      invalid reference 
      Prop
      . The method constructs the expected button name using the entity's name and retrieves the corresponding prop from the current game environment.
      Parameters:
      entity - the prop for which the corresponding button should be retrieved
      Returns:
      the associated Button, or null if the prop is not found or cannot be cast
